name: execution-apis
description: Collection of JSON-RPC APIs provided by Ethereum 1.0 clients

scripts.build: npm run build:spec && npm run build:docs && npm run build:test
scripts.build:test: which go > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: Go binary not found. Please install Go first.' && exit 1) && go install github.com/lightclient/rpctestgen/cmd/speccheck@latest
scripts.build:docs: npm run generate-clients && npm run build:docs:gatsby
scripts.build:docs:gatsby: cp README.md docs/reference/quickstart.md && cd build/docs/gatsby && npm install && gatsby build --prefix-paths
scripts.lint: node scripts/build.js && node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/graphql-validate.js
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch docs --watch README.md --ignore docs/reference/quickstart.md --ext yaml,md,json --exec "npm run build && cp ./openrpc.json build/docs/gatsby/src/openrpc.json && cp README.md docs/reference/quickstart.md && npm run serve"

author: Ethereum
